text:
less than and greater than signs are not escaped <>, causing html code to show
up as html code and not text.  This causes a problem while debugging jsp code.
creator: nick@nag83.com

text:
See http://marc.theaimsgroup.com/?l=tomcat-dev&m=107300126805136&w=2

creator: markt@apache.org
